it_hilfe.it_hilfe_gui2_logic module¶

class it_hilfe.it_hilfe_gui2_logic.MainWindowLogic¶

Bases: PySide2.QtWidgets.QWidget

handles all action on MainWin

cancel(widgets: list) → None¶

click event for all cancel buttons

shows fist page in stacked widget and clears all widgets in widgets

Parameters

widgets – defines list containing widgets to clear, only widgets with method .clear() are possible

Returns

None

change(x: int) → None¶

changes existing device parameters x == 0: fill combobox, x == 1: paramtypeIndex has changed, based on that the new valtype is determined x == 2: retrieve data, change parameter, clear, and save :param x: determines a which state to execute this function

d_click_table_devicename(referenz: str) → None¶

handels double click event on devicename in table widget

Parameters

referenz – current selceted text of cell

Returns

None

new(stage: bool) → None¶

creates new csv file to save into

stage is True: set filepath stage is False: set new name, save :param stage: determines a which stage to execute this function

open(test: bool) → None¶

opens csv file and loads its content into registered devices :param test: skip filedialog if unittested aka test == True, fname has to be set in test script

register() → None¶

registers a new device and saves it int csv

save() → None¶

saves content fo registered_devices into specified csv file

search() → None¶

searches for a given username in registered devices and outputs on statusbar

staticMetaObject = <PySide2.QtCore.QMetaObject object>¶
update_combobox(box, data: list) → None¶

clears combo box

updates combobox so that old content not needed any more isnt displayed and adds ‘choose here’ dummy to ensure an index change will be made (updating next box depends on index change) :param box: instance of pyqt5.QtWidgets.qComboBox :param data: data supposed to be inserted into combobox

Returns

None

update_table(table, content) → None¶

updates any table with data of registered_devices

first clears table, then fills up with new values

Parameters

  • table – instance of pyqt5.QtWidgets.qTable

  • content – instances of any device of which its attributes will be content of table

Returns

None

validate(command, line_edit_list: Optional[list] = None, combo_box_list: Optional[list] = None, data=None, allowed: Optional[list] = None, forbidden: Optional[list] = None, checkfname: Optional[bool] = None, checkregistered: Optional[bool] = None) → None¶

validates user input

Parameters

  • command – function to be called after vailidation process if finished

  • line_edit_list – contents pyqt5.QtWidgets.QlineEdit instances to be checked if empty or current text in forbidden or not in allowed

  • combo_box_list – contents pyqt5.QtWidgets.qComboBox instances to be checked if nothing selected

  • data – data to be passed into command function if needed

  • allowed – houses key wihich are allowed to be entered

  • forbidden – houses keys which are not allowed to be entered

  • checkfname – check weather an file path exists or not

  • checkregistered – check weather something is already registered or not

Returns

None

Bases: PySide2.QtWidgets.QWidget

closes StartStartsceen Window and creates instance of MainWindow
